de.systemagmbh.common.util
Class CSysDateConverter

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.common.util.CSysDateConverter
Deprecated. As of release 2.5, replaced by de.systemagmbh.tools.util.CSysDateConverter

public class CSysDateConverter
extends Object

CSysDateConverter handles Timestamps formatted as Strings. It is able to convert between two formats and Date / or create timestamps. Also as of 21.1.02 ISO 8601 format converstion.

Version:
$Date: 2005/08/18 10:30:47 $
Author:
Mick Hogan, Herbert Helmstreit

Deprecated. 
Make a String out of a Date.

Parameters:

Returns:

Deprecated. 
mh 21.1.02: for ISO 8601 format converstion. Generate a ISO 8601 date from a Java Date object

Parameters:

Returns:

fromIsoDate

public static Date fromIsoDate(String isodate)
Deprecated. 
mh 21.1.02: for ISO 8601 format converstion. Parse the given string in ISO 8601 format and build a Java Date object.

Parameters:
isodate - the date in ISO 8601 format
Returns:
a Date instance or null if the parse fails
